com.newatlanta.appengine.taskqueue
Interface Deferred.Deferrable

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Enclosing class:
Deferred
public static interface Deferred.Deferrable
extends java.io.Serializable

The Deferrable interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to be executed as background tasks. The implementation class must define a no-arguments method of no arguments named doTask().

Method Summary
 void doTask()
          Invoked to perform the background task.
 

Method Detail

doTask

void doTask()
            throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                   java.io.IOException
Invoked to perform the background task.

Throws:
Deferred.PermanentTaskFailure - To indicate that the task should not be retried; all other exceptions cause the task to be retried. These exceptions are logged.
javax.servlet.ServletException - To indicate that the task should be retried. These exceptions are not logged.
java.io.IOException - To indicate that the task should be retried. These exceptions are not logged.
